sent once a day, and only if there are new matching items. **About** Howdy! I'm Jordan Green, a Report for America corps member covering underserved communities in East Texas for the Longview News-Journal. I'm a native Okie and have been a newsman since 2017. Email me at jordan.green@news-journal.com or call me at 903-237-7743. It depends who you ask** Updated5 hrs ago Republicans representing Texas in Congress say proposed reforms to Medicaid and the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program are necessary to… **'We want them to be better': Longview Christian counseling service offers low-cost care, seeks to grow** Updated5 hrs ago As the demand for mental healthcare increases, the staffers and volunteers at the nonprofit Pathstones Counseling Center in Longview hope support for the organization will, too. **Great Texas Balloon Race soars back into Longview with classic activities, music and more** UpdatedJun 6, 2025 High-flying fun will soon return to Longview during the annual Great Texas Balloon Race. Hot air balloons will sail through the skies above the city as part of the U.S. Nationals Hot Air Balloon Championship, which is held in conjunction with GTBR and is set 6:30 a.m. June 9 through 15. **East Texas native eager to help students as new Gregg County 4-H, youth development leader** UpdatedJun 9, 2025 After spending some time in community outreach, East Texas native Dameyun Thompson is returning to his roots in education. And as a 4-H and youth development agent in Gregg County, he’ll have a lot of roots to work with.
